tags.string:
**Example - JavaScript** 

// Controller of component 'path/to/component_name'
var ctrl = zuix.controller(function(cp) {
    // `cp` is the {ContextController}
    cp.create = function() { ... };
    cp.destroy = function() { ... }
}).for('path/to/component_name');

{ContextControllerHandler} handler The controller handler
function ```function(cp){ ... } ```,
where `cp` is the [`{ContextController}`](#ZUIX_API--ContextController)
object that is passed to the handler once the component
is created.
tags.name: handler
tags.description:
The controller handler function ```function(cp){ ... } ```,
where `cp` is the [`{ContextController}`](#ZUIX_API--ContextController)
object that is passed to the handler once the component
is created.

description.full: Initializes a controller ```handler```.
description.summary: Initializes a controller ```handler```.

code: Zuix.prototype.controller = controller;

tags.string:
**Example - HTML** ```html
``` **Example - JavaScript** ```js var containerDiv = zuix.field('container-div'); containerDiv.html('Hello World!'); ```
{!string} fieldName The class to check for.
tags.name: fieldName

tags.string: {!Element} [container] Starting DOM element for this search (**default:** *document*)
tags.name: [container]
tags.description: Starting DOM element for this search (**default:** *document*)

description.full:
Searches and returns elements with `data-ui-field`
attribute matching the given `fieldName`.
description.summary:
Searches and returns elements with `data-ui-field`
attribute matching the given `fieldName`.

code: Zuix.prototype.field = field;

tags.string: {Element} [element] Container to use as starting node for the search (**default:** *document*).
tags.name: [element]
tags.description: Container to use as starting node for the search (**default:** *document*).

description.full:
Searches inside the given element ```element```
for all ```data-ui-include``` and ```data-ui-load```
directives and process them.
This is to be called if adding dynamically content
with elements that declare the above attributes.
description.summary:
Searches inside the given element ```element```
for all ```data-ui-include``` and ```data-ui-load```
directives and process them.
This is to be called if adding dynamically content
with elements that declare the above attributes.

tags.string:
<small>**Example - JavaScript**</small>
```js
var exampleController = zuix.controller(function(cp){
    cp.create = function() {
        cp.expose('test', testMethod);
        cp.view().html('Helllo World!');
    }
    function testMethod() {
        console.log('Test method exposing');
        cp.view().html('A simple test.');
    }
});
var componentOptions = {
    container: zuix.field('container-div');
    controller: exampleController,
    ready: function () {
        console.log('Loading complete.');
        console.log('Component context instance', this);
    },
    error: function(error) {
        console.log('Loading error!', error);
    }
};
var ctx = zuix.load('path/to/component_name', componentOptions);
ctx.test();
```
{!string} componentId The identifier name of the component to be loaded.
tags.name: componentId
tags.description: The identifier name of the component to be loaded.

tags.string: {ContextOptions} [options] Options used to initialize the loaded component.
tags.name: [options]
tags.description: Options used to initialize the loaded component.

description.full:
Loads a component with the given options.
This is the programmatic equivalent of
`data-ui-include` or `data-ui-load`.
All available options are described in the
`ContextOptions` object documentation.
description.summary:
Loads a component with the given options.
This is the programmatic equivalent of
`data-ui-include` or `data-ui-load`.
All available options are described in the
`ContextOptions` object documentation.

code: Zuix.prototype.load = load;

tags.string: {ComponentContext} context The `ComponentContext` instance of the component to be unloaded.
tags.name: context
tags.description: The `ComponentContext` instance of the component to be unloaded.

description.full: Unload and dispose the component.
description.summary: Unload and dispose the component.

tags.string:
**Example - HTML** ```html
...
``` **Example - JavaScript** ```js var slideShowDiv = zuix.$.find('[data-ui-context="my-slide-show"]'); var ctx = zuix.context(slideShowDiv); // or var ctx = zuix.context('my-slide-show'); // call component's exposed methods ctx.setSlide(1); ```

{Element|ZxQuery|object} contextId The `contextId` object
(usually a string) or the component's container/view element.
tags.name: contextId
tags.description: The `contextId` object (usually a string) or the component's container/view element.

description.full:
Get the `ComponentContext`, given its `contextId`
or component's container/view element.
HTML attribute equivalent: `data-ui-context`.
description.summary:
Get the `ComponentContext`, given its `contextId`
or component's container/view element.
HTML attribute equivalent: `data-ui-context`.

code: Zuix.prototype.context = context;

tags.string: {string} componentId Identifier name of the component to create.
tags.name: componentId
tags.description: Identifier name of the component to create.

description.full:
Create an instance of the component `componentId`
loading it asynchronously and immediately returning its
context object with associated container element (detached).
description.summary:
Create an instance of the component `componentId`
loading it asynchronously and immediately returning its
context object with associated container element (detached).

tags.string: {Object} context Context (`this`) for the event handler
tags.name: context

tags.string: {string} eventPath The path of the event to fire.
tags.name: eventPath
tags.description: The path of the event to fire.

tags.string: {object} [eventData] The data object of the event.
tags.name: [eventData]
tags.description: The data object of the event.

description.full: Triggers the event specified by `eventPath`.
description.summary: Triggers the event specified by `eventPath`.
Set handlers for global events hooks.
description.body:
<small>**Example - JavaScript**</small>
```js
// The context `this` in the event handlers will be
// the {ComponentContext} object that sourced the event.
// The `data` parameter passed to the handlers, is of
// variant type, depending on the type of the occurring event.
zuix
  .hook('load:begin', function(data){
    loaderMessage.html('Loading "'+data.task+'" ...');
    loaderMessage.show();

}).hook('load:next', function(data){
    loaderMessage.html('"'+data.task+'" done, loading next..');

}).hook('load:end', function(){
    loaderMessage.hide();

}).hook('html:parse', function (data) {
    // ShowDown - MarkDown syntax compiler
    if (this.options().markdown === true && typeof showdown !== 'undefined')
        data.content = new showdown.Converter()
            .makeHtml(data.content);

}).hook('css:parse', function (data) {
    // process css, eg. run a CSS pre-processor
    // eg. Sass, Less, ...

}).hook('view:process', function (view) {
    // The view DOM is now fully loaded and ready

    // Prism code syntax highlighter
    view.find('code').each(function (i, block) {
        this.addClass('language-javascript');
        Prism.highlightElement(block);
    });

    // Force opening of all non-local links in a new window
    zuix.$('a[href*="://"]').attr('target','_blank');

    // Material Design Light auto-detection
    // Call DOM upgrade on newly added view elements
    if (componentHandler)
        componentHandler.upgradeElements(view.get());

});
```

description.full: Enable/Disable lazy-loading, or get current setting.
description.summary: Enable/Disable lazy-loading, or get current setting.

tags.string: {Zuix|boolean} *true* if HTTP caching is enabled, *false* otherwise.
tags.description: *true* if HTTP caching is enabled, *false* otherwise.

description.full: Enable/Disable HTTP caching
description.summary: Enable/Disable HTTP caching

tags.string: {Array.<{ view, css, controller }>} bundleData A bundle object holding in memory all components data (cache).
tags.name: bundleData
tags.description: A bundle object holding in memory all components data (cache).

description.full: Gets/Sets the components data bundle.
description.summary: Gets/Sets the components data bundle.
